channel.title: Me covering "The Futile" by Say Anything (I sing so watch it)
channel.description:
I know most of this userbase isn't going to like this style of music but meh:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1-I_vgouk2M
I threw it together in like 30 minutes, so it's not amazing :P but it's pretty good compared to others imo. Tell me what you all think!

item.title: Me covering "The Futile" by Say Anything (I sing so watch it)

[/quote]

item.title: Me covering "The Futile" by Say Anything (I sing so watch it)
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:40, topic:353573”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=449887.msg3302094#msg3302094 date=1281383250]
Try singing some Panic! At The Disco. Your voice sounds good for that kind of music.
[/quote]I’m in love with you now lol. That is my favorite band at the moment and so many people have told me that. I’m actually thinking about covering one of their songs, but I can’t get the confidence to actually cover it because Brendan Urie is such an amazing singer (if that doesn’t sound gay).

Anyways, I was thinking about covering either:

Northern Downpour by P!ATD

or

The Only Difference… by P!ATD[/quote]

I actually used to like P!ATD a while back and I still listen to them at times. My favorite songs by them were Camisado and Time to Dance - cover those please.

Read full topic

item.title: Me covering "The Futile" by Say Anything (I sing so watch it)

item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

I actually thought you could do good with I Write Sins, Not Tragedies. Either way, its P!ATD, and I think you’ll do great lol.

Shit, now I wanna make a cover Too bad I can’t play any instruments though.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:36, topic:353573”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=449887.msg3302045#msg3302045 date=1281380965]
Suggestions for new songs, gogogo.
[/quote]

Do you play just piano? Or anything else?[/quote]I play some guitar. For everything I do though, I never look up chords or sheet music. I do it all by ear. When it comes to guitar though, most of the time I look up chords or tutorials =\ lol. My friend plays the guitar surprisingly well though, so if you have any suggestions I’ll have him play it for me.

Read full topic

item.title: Me covering "The Futile" by Say Anything (I sing so watch it)
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Errorist, post:27, topic:353573”][quote author=The Soul link=topic=449887.msg3301101#msg3301101 date=1281311296]

HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA.

This wasn’t spam. To whichever moderator deleted it you need to be a little more cautious when deleting posts.

I was the one who deleted it, and I did so because it brought nothing productive to the thread’s discussion at all whatsoever. As for the warn, it isn’t the first time he’s gone around trolling people / spamming their threads.
[/quote]My HAHAHA reply wasn’t to spam the thread. It was my reaction to the YouTube video. No one else laughed as he sang the high notes? I’m sure if it wasn’t your friend’s video and some random guy posted a link to himself singing the laughing response would have been fine. Try not to be a hypocrite.[/quote]He’s not my friend yet I didn’t laugh…

Read full topic

@rip4d wrote:

I honestly doing it to be good, and I do like that style of music, but you still couldve done better with the higher notes. Every time you sang the “rat poison for dinner” line it sounded like dinnar. Aside from that I really liked it. I envy your piano skills lol :3
